name: Spear of Lugh
shortDescription: The Flaming Spear That Never Missed Its Mark
fullDescription:
The Flaming Spear That Never Missed Its Mark The Spear of Lugh (Gae Assail or Areadbhair) is one of the Four Treasures of the Tuatha
                    De Danann, the magical race who ruled Ireland in the mythological age. This fiery spear
                    was brought from the city of Gorias by the Tuatha De Danann when they came to Ireland,
                    and it was wielded by Lugh Lamhfada (Lugh of the Long Arm), the master of all skills.

properties.name: Origin
properties.value: City of Gorias in the Otherworld
